name: Aashray Social Welfare Foundation

address: Near Associate Petrol Pump, C. G. Road

briefDescription: We are a non government organization, with a clear objective to serve in underserved areas andempower the villagers from remote area. The organisation focuses on giving a respectable life to variousvulnerable sections by developing the local skills and potential available in the rural areas for their brightfuture.Our journey started with Total Sanitation Campaign and since then we have been actively working ondiversified activities like Craft, Development of eco-friendly products, Development of Market linkages,Women Empowerment, Drinking Water, Animal husbandry, Health, Education etc.Our organization is committed to provide basic amenities in the underserved areas and work as acatalyst for providing sustainable means of livelihood through educating, training, capacity building andempowering the needy sections of the society.
